remarks: Proof of a single axiom that can replace both ~ ax-c7 and ~ ax-11 .  See ~ axc711toc7 and ~ axc711to11 for the re-derivation of those axioms. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axc711 $p |- ( -. A. x -. A. y A. x ph -> A. y ph ) $.
